title: BBQ seasoning
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried ground sage', '1 teaspoon dried ground oregano', 'cayenne pepper (to taste)', '1 teaspoon sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon celery salt', '1 teaspoon dried ground rosemary', 'chilli powder (to taste)', 'salt (according to taste)', '1 teaspoon dried ground thyme', '1 teaspoon ground cumin']
